column1: Kata Robata////My mom got very upset about the quality of the service so I asked to speak to the manager. Honestly
column2: it seemed he didn't care that much either. Our server made a little effort after that
column4: our dinner was ruined already anyway. I work in the same industry
column6: it was the worst service I've ever had. There are so many Japanese restaurants in Houston
column7: I'll definitely go somewhere else next time.
